name: plc-modbus-trainer
description: A web-based interactive training application for learning PLC and MODBUS protocol concepts

scripts.clean-pyc: python3 -c "import os, pathlib; [p.unlink() for p in pathlib.Path('.').rglob('*.pyc')]; [p.rmdir() for p in pathlib.Path('.').rglob('__pycache__') if p.is_dir()]"
scripts.install-deps: python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install fastapi uvicorn[standard] jinja2 markdown-it-py websockets pydantic numpy pymodbus==3.6.8
scripts.start: npm run install-deps && . venv/bin/activate && python run.py
scripts.dev: npm run install-deps && . venv/bin/activate && python run.py
